Plot gene/transcript models

Source: R/PLOT.locus.R
PLOT.transcript_model_track.Rd

Plot gene/transcript models

PLOT.transcript_model_track(
  finemap_dat,
  max_transcripts = 1,
  remove_pseudogenes = T,
  show.legend = T,
  show_plot = F,
  fill = "skyblue",
  shape = c("arrow", "box", "ellipse", "smallArrow"),
  transcriptAnnotation = c("symbol", "transcript"),
  collapseTranscripts = c(F, T, "longest"),
  stacking = c("squish", "hide", "dense", "pack", "full"),
  method = "ggplot",
  xtext = T,
  expand_x_mult = c(0.05, 0.1),
  verbose = T
)

Source

ensembld tutorial Gvix tutorial ggbio tutorial

Examples

data("LRRK2")
gene_track <- PLOT.transcript_model_track(finemap_dat=LRRK2)
#> Error in dplyr::slice_max(., order_by = c(symbol, width), n = max_transcripts,     with_ties = F): Problem while computing indices.
#> ℹ The error occurred in group 1: symbol = "AC079630.4".
#> Caused by error:
#> ! `order_by` must have size 1, not size 2.
